query.name: SELECT_ALL_SIBLING_COUNT
query.default: SELECT RES.RESOURCE_ID, RES.SIBLING_COUNT FROM CMS_${PROJECT}_RESOURCES RES, CMS_${PROJECT}_STRUCTURE STR WHERE RES.RESOURCE_ID = STR.RESOURCE_ID ORDER BY RES.RESOURCE_ID

query.name: CREATE_STRUCTURE_FOR_RESOURCE
query.default: INSERT INTO CMS_${PROJECT}_STRUCTURE (PARENT_ID, STRUCTURE_ID, RESOURCE_ID, RESOURCE_PATH, STRUCTURE_STATE, DATE_EXPIRED, DATE_RELEASED, STRUCTURE_VERSION) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

query.name: SELECT_LOST_FOUND_ID
query.default: SELECT STRUCTURE_ID FROM CMS_${PROJECT}_STRUCTURE WHERE RESOURCE_PATH=?;
